channel.title: [PI] dds fix?
channel.description: my dds on project insamity hits far too high when using spec..i have lowerd the weapon strength bonus yet that does nothing..? any1 know why the spec hits so high and how i can lower it?

item.title: [PI] dds fix?
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:2, topic:377304”]Why people don’t reply to this is funny.

Go in CombatAssistant.java and search 5698 (Thats ddp++ id.)

Change accuracy and maxDamage. Your welcome.[/quote]

if(Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence()) > Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) && !veracsEffect) { damage = 0; c.bonusAttack = 0; } else if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 5698 && o.poisonDamage <= 0 && Misc.random(3) == 1) { o.getPA().appendPoison(13); c.bonusAttack += damage/3; } else { c.bonusAttack += damage/3; }

so This is what u mean? and i would change the “damage/3;” 3 higher to raise hit? lower lower?

also i found 2 if statements for 5698

if(Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence()) > Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) && !veracsEffect && !c.usingClaws) { damage = 0; c.bonusAttack = 0; } else if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 5698 && o.poisonDamage <= 0 && Misc.random(3) == 1) { o.getPA().appendPoison(13); c.bonusAttack += damage/3; } else { c.bonusAttack += damage/3; }

Read full topic
